free.chess
Class PieceChooser

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              free.chess.PieceChooser
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener
public class PieceChooser
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

A dialog which lets the user choose a Piece from the given set of pieces.

See Also:

showPieceChooser

public static Piece showPieceChooser(java.awt.Component parentComponent,
                                     Piece[] pieces,
                                     PiecePainter painter,
                                     Piece defaultPiece)
Displays a modal dialog over the given Component which lets the user choose from the given set of Pieces which are painted using the given PiecePainter. Returns the piece chosen by the user.

addActionListener

public void addActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
Adds an ActionListener to this PieceChooser. An ActionEvent is fired when a piece is chosen.
